text: Adopt the pace of nature: her secret is patience.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

text: If patience is worth anything, it must endure to the end of time. And a living faith will last in the midst of the blackest storm.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

text: I have just three things to teach: simplicity, patience, compassion. These three are your greatest treasures.
author: Lao Tzu

text: Patience and time do more than strength or passion.
author: Jean de La Fontaine

text: The marvel of all history is the patience with which men and women submit to burdens unnecessarily laid upon them by their governments.
author: George Washington
